ServerGroup.Name: 7Days2Mod CompoPack
ServerGroup.Description: Various mods from users, combined with Magoli's prefab compopack.

Server.Name: Vanilla XML
Server.Description: Vanilla XML Files with Magoli's CompoPack This includes a copy of the vanilla XML files.

Server.Name: Unofficial XML Fixes
Server.Description: A collection of unofficial XML Fixes by the Community with Magoli's CompoPack

Server.Name: Valmod Expansion
Server.Description:
Valmar's Expansion Mod with Magoli's CompoPack This is a relatively large mod pack I've gradually created over time. It's mainly a collaboration of all my smaller mods placed together into one larger file.
The Expansion pack is meant to be viewed, as the name implies, as an expansion pack for the game. What this means is that it adds a bunch of new features to the game without dramatically changing the overall vanilla gameplay experience. Great if you're happy with 7DTD but just want to have more stuff to do.

Server.Name: Valmod Overhaul
Server.Description:
Valmar Overhaul Mod with Magoli's CompoPack This is a relatively large mod pack I've gradually created over time. It's mainly a collaboration of all my smaller mods placed together into one larger file.
The Overhaul pack adds the same items and content to the game as the expansion with the key difference being that unlike the expansion the overhaul, as the name implies overhauls some basic aspects of the game. Mainly the recipe system is considerably locked down compared to vanilla. The overhaul is intended for those who want a new experience from the game.

Server.Name: Valmod Classic Horde Survival
Server.Description:
Valmar's Classic Horde Survival Mod with Magoli's CompoPack Welcome to CHS - Classic Horde Survival. This mod aims to offer a completely different experience from vanilla. If you want a mod that adds more farming, crafting, building or expands the game to last for hundreds of days this is NOT the mod for you. This mod is intended to be more towards having a few hours of fun in a horde mode rather than spending weeks building cities. If you just want to kill hordes of zombies while scavenging for food and ammo, this mod might be for you.
Warning: If you have a below average computer you may experience FPS issues when playing this mod due to the large number of zombie spawns. You can lower your games spawn settings in the game options to try to dial it back some but your millage may vary.

Server.Name: Valmod HORDE Edition
Server.Description: Valmar's Horde Edition More zombies, and headshots to kill! This is a relatively large mod pack I've gradually created over time. It's mainly a collaboration of all my smaller mods placed together into one larger file. The Overhaul pack adds the same items and content to the game as the expansion with the key difference being that unlike the expansion the overhaul, as the name implies overhauls some basic aspects of the game. Mainly the recipe system is considerably locked down compared to vanilla. The overhaul is intended for those who want a new experience from the game.

Server.Name: True Survival
Server.Description: True Survival Mod with Magoli's CompoPack Modded for more challenging survival combined with a steady slow progression in building and crafting.

Server.Name: A Clockwork Project Experimental
Server.Description: A Clockwork Project Experimental Mod for Alpha 14.7 with Magoli's CompoPack This mod is designed to perfectly balance all aspects of the game from Progression to Loot and Crafting!

Server.Name: A Clockwork Project Alpha 14.4
Server.Description: A Clockwork Project Mod for Alpha 14.4 with Magoli's CompoPack This mod is designed to perfectly balance all aspects of the game from Progression to Loot and Crafting!
